subject: Re: [junit] Using assertion outside testcase
msgSnippet: ... I don t understand what you re trying to do. A [junit] assertion, when it fails, throws a suitable exception. The test case framework catches the exception
messageBody:
On Friday 22 June 2007 02:35, sireesha wrote:

> how can we use assertions outside a junit testcase and still make the
> test case handle it.

I don't understand what you're trying to do.

A [junit] assertion, when it fails, throws a suitable exception. The
test case framework catches the exception and records it. The test
case itself doesn't handle assertion exceptions.

Show us a concrete example.
